previous.excerpt:
First, it's on an uptrend that is putting serious pressure on Short Sellers. We
could see it jump 200% in the next couple of weeks as Shorts try to cover their
positions.

Second, all AMC has to do, is survive the next few months for the stock to be
profitable down the road. I've never been so bored…
previous.title: AMC stock looks great in two ways ...

localize.title: AMC股票在两个方面看起来很不错......
localize.the_new_excerpt:
首先，它的上升趋势给卖空者带来严重压力。我们
可能会看到它在未来几周内跳涨200%，因为Shorts试图掩盖他们的。
阵地。

其次，AMC要做的，就是在未来几个月内生存下来，股价才能
盈利的道路。我从来没有这么无聊过... ...

localize.title: AMC股票在兩個方面看起來很不錯......
localize.the_new_excerpt:
首先，它的上升趨勢給賣空者帶來嚴重壓力。我們
可能會看到它在未來幾周內跳漲200%，因爲Shorts試圖掩蓋他們的。
陣地。

其次，AMC要做的，就是在未來幾個月內生存下來，股價才能
盈利的道路。我從來沒有這麼無聊過... ...

My purpose in writing this is to try to bring some sanity back to the public
markets. I recognize we may be long past that point, but if it helps marginally,
it’s worth saying.

By way of background, I am a private equity investor with 10 years of
experience. I have done due diligence on companies…
